text: Otar Turashvili (; born 14 July 1986) is a Georgian born Romanian rugby union player. He plays primarily as a hooker and occasionally as a prop for professional SuperLiga club București and București-based European Challenge Cup side the Wolves. Turashvili also plays for Romania's national team the Oaks. ==References== ==External links== * * * * Otar Turashvili at US Colomiers Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Tbilisi Category:Romanian rugby union players Category:Romania international rugby union players Category:Rugby union players from Georgia (country) Category:Georgian emigrants to Romania Category:București Wolves players Category:CSM București (rugby) players Category:Rugby union hookers
title: Otar Turashvili
